price: 26. Dan betapa banyak malaikat di langit, syafaat (pertolongan) mereka sedikit pun tidak berguna kecuali apabila Allah mengizinkan (dan hanya) bagi siapa yang Dia kehendaki dan Dia ridai.
arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam min malakin fī al-samāwāti lā tugh'nī shafāʿatuhum shayan illā min baʿdi an yadhana al-lahu liman yashāu wayarḍā
